maqras.text: 69|1|Se abasyambhabi ghatana
69|2|ki se abasyambhabi ghatana
69|3|ara kise apanake janabe se abasyambhabi ghatana ki
69|4|samuda o ‘ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila bhitiprada mahabipada samparke [1].
69|5|Atahpara samuda sampradaya, taderake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pralayankara biparyayakari pracanda citkara dbara
69|6|ara ‘ada sampradaya, taderake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pracanda thanda jhanjhabayu dbara [1]
69|7|ya tini tadera upara prabahita karechilena satarata o atadina biramahinabhabe; takhana apani ukta sampradayake dekhatena--- tara sekhane lutiye pare ache sarasun'ya khejura kandera n'yaya.
69|8|Atahpara tadera ka'uke'o apani bidyamana dekhate pana ki
69|9|ara phira‘a'una, tara purbabartira ebam ultiye deya janapada papacare lipta chila [1].
69|10|Atahpara tara tadera rabera rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale tini taderake pakara'o karalena --- kathora pakara'o.
69|11|Yakhana jalocchbasa hayechila niscaya takhana amara tomaderake arohana kariyechilama nauyane
69|12|amara eta karechilama tomadera siksara jan'ya ebam ejan'ye ye, yate srutidhara kana eta sanraksana kare.
69|13|Atahpara yakhana singaya [1] phumka deya habe ---ekati matra phumka [2]
69|14|ara parbatamala saha prthibi utksipta habe ebam matra eka dhakkaya tara curna-bicurna haye yabe.
69|15|Phale sedina sanghatita habe mahaghatana
69|16|ara asamana bidirna haye yabe phale sedina ta durbala-biksipta haye parabe.
69|17|Ara pherestagana asamanera pranta dese thakabe ebam sedina atajana phirista apanara rabera ‘arasake dharana karabe tadera upare.
69|18|Sedina upasthita kara habe tomaderake ebam tomadera kono gopana'i ara gopana thakabe na.
69|19|Takhana yake tara ‘amalanama tara dana hate deya habe, se balabe, ‘la'o, amara ‘amalanama pare dekha [1]
69|20|‘ami drrhabisbasa karatama ye, amake amara hisebera sam'mukhina hate habe.’
69|21|Kaje'i se yapana karabe santosajanaka jibana
69|22|su'ucca jannate
69|23|yara phalarasi abanamita thakabe nagalera madhye.
69|24|Bala habe, ‘panahara kara trptira sathe, tomara atita dine ya karechile tara binimaye.’
69|25|Kintu yara ‘amalanama tara bama hate deya habe, se balabe, ‘haya! Amake yadi deya'i na hata amara ‘amalanama
69|26|ara ami yadi na janatama amara hiseba
69|27|‘haya! Amara mrtyu'i yadi amara sesa hata
69|28|‘amara dhana-sampada amara kono kaje'i asala na.
69|29|‘Amara ksamata'o binasta hayeche.’
69|30|Pheresataderake bala habe, ‘dhara take, tara galaya beri pariye da'o.
69|31|‘Tarapara tomara take jahanname prabesa kariye dagdha kara.
69|32|‘Tarapara take srnkhalita kara emana eka sekale yara dairghya habe sattara hata’ [1]
69|33|niscaya se mahana allahara prati imanadara chila na
69|34|ara misakinake annadane utsahita karata na
69|35|ata'eba, e dina tara kono suhrda thakabe na
69|36|ara kono khadya thakabe na ksata nihsrta sraba chara
69|37|ya aparadhi chara ke'u khabe na.
69|38|Ata'eba, ami kasama karachi tara, ya tomara dekhate pa'o
69|39|ebam ya tomara dekhate pa'ona tara'o
69|40|niscaya e kura'ana eka sam'manita rasulera (bahita) bani [1].
69|41|Ara eta kono kabira katha naya; tomara khuba alpa'i imana posana kare thaka
69|42|eta kono ganakera katha'o naya, tomara alpa'i upadesa grahana kara.
69|43|Eta srstikulera rabera kacha theke nayilakrta.
69|44|Tini yadi amadera name kono katha racana kare calate cesta karatena
69|45|tabe abasya'i amara take pakara'o karatama dana hata diye [1]
69|46|tarapara abasya'i amara kete ditama tara hrdapindera sira
69|47|atahpara tomadera madhye emana ke'u'i ne'i, ye tamke raksa karate pare.
69|48|Ara e kura'ana muttakidera jan'ya abasya'i eka upadesa.
69|49|Ara amara abasya'i jani ye, tomadera madhye mithya aropakari rayeche.
69|50|Ara e kura'ana niscaya'i kaphiradera anusocanara karana habe
69|51|ara niscaya eta suniscita satya.
69|52|Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna.
70|1|Eka byakti ca'ila, sanghatita hoka sasti ya abadharita [1]
70|2|kaphiradera jan'ya, etake pratirodha karara ke'u ne'i [1].
70|3|Eta asabe allahara kacha theke, yini urdhbarohanera sopanasamuhera adhikari [1].
70|4|Pheresata ebam ruha allahara dike urdhbagami haya [1] emana eka dine, yara parimana pancasa hajara bachara [2].
70|5|Kaje'i apani dhairya dharana karuna parama dhairya.
70|6|Tara ai dinake mane kare sudura
70|7|kintu amara dekhachi ta asanna [1]
70|8|sedina akasa habe galita dhatura mata
70|9|ebam parbatasamuha habe rangina pasamera mata
70|10|ebam suhrda suhrdera khomja nebe na
70|11|taderake kara habe eke aparera drstigocara. Aparadhi sedinera sastira badale dite ca'ibe tara santana-santatike
70|12|ara tara stri o bha'ike
70|13|ara tara jnati-gosthike, yara take asraya dita
70|14|ara yamine yara ache tadera saba'ike, tarapara yate eti take mukti deya.
70|15|Kakhana'i naya, niscaya eta lelihana aguna
70|16|ya mathara camara khasiye debe [1].
70|17|Jahannama se byaktike dakabe, ye satyera prati pitha dekhiyechila ebam mukha phiriye niyechila.
70|18|Ara ye sampada punjibhuta karechila atahpara sanraksita kare rekhechila [1].
